name: RAHUL SONWANSHI
summary: I’m Rahul Sonwanshi and I’m passonate about computer technology also I’m hard working and dedicated person who finishes the task on time.

education.summary: During this time I participated in various hackathons and competition. I’ve learned a lot.
I’ve learned a lot during my time at junior college preparing for competition.
This is the place where I studied for my 10th board exams.

experience.summary: During this period I worked as a freelance developer building websites for my clients for their businesses and also provided micro services such as background removal and enhancing images for their products.

During this period I worked on automating consolidation process for companies to generate annual/ quarterly reports, balance sheets, RERA Reports and Reconciliation Report. This automation process eliminates a lot of manual errors and keep track of all the records in 1 place.
During this period I learned how to develop Android applications using eclipse IDE and the fundamentals of JAVA.

awards.summary: 1st Position for developing virtual assistant Chrome Web app, Socius, in 12 hours using various APIs such as – Exotel SMS/Call API, Google Speech-to-Text, Social Login APIs, Google Maps Distance Matrix, Google Calendar.
3rd Position for developing utility software that helps you manage files in your system efficiently and easily, File Organizer, using C#. For more details refer Project Section.
